llm_res.rule: The transferFrom function must throw unless msg.sender is the current owner, an authorized operator, or the approved address for this NFT. It must also throw if from is not the current owner, if to is the zero address, or if tokenId is not a valid NFT.
The approve function must throw unless msg.sender is the current NFT owner, or an authorized operator of the current owner.
The getApproved function must throw if tokenId is not a valid NFT.
